Quality Education.reason: Focus on learning visual communication design theory and practice.

課程目標為實作導向課程

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course explicitly focuses on innovation by incorporating 'AI圖像協作工具與技巧學習' (Learning of AI image collaboration tools and techniques) and applying it to the creative industry.
evidence: AI圖像協作工具與技巧學習 (Learning of AI image collaboration tools and techniques)
指導參加國內外設計及AI圖像生成相關競賽 (Guiding participation in domestic and international design and AI image generation competitions)
